definition: A term used to describe something that stands out or is easily noticeable due to its distinct and striking characteristics. It is commonly used to describe a person, object, or feature that is particularly prominent or remarkable in appearance, behavior, or style.

examples.german: Das Gebäude hat eine markante Architektur.
examples.english: The building has a striking architecture.

examples.german: Seine markante Persönlichkeit beeindruckt viele Menschen.
examples.english: His remarkable personality impresses many people.
